resources.string: For cars, bikes, motorcycles and drones
You can locate anything all over the world. Bluetooth included to find objects near you and in enclosed spaces.
Smaller and thinner than the GPS version, it works perfectly in enclosed spaces and it warns you if you leave your objects behind.
The primary charging method for our devices is Qi Wireless, a USB port is also included.
We use 3D printers to manufacture by ourselves all our products and to give you the best available materials.
Our trackers can be used only by its owner and we guarantee a completely anonymous and secure service.
BEING A STARTUP MEANS TO CREATE SOMETHING FROM NOTHING

Our team was born at the beginning of 2015 in order to create something from nothing, this was and is our goal. We have worked hard for months to develop an idea, studying how to give the best product to thousands of costumers all over the world. Here we are with Trivo, the most little and cheapest GPS tracking device all over the world, we are going to change your life forever: no more lost wallets or keys and the things you care the most always with you.\nWe are here to ask you for your help to start our dream, with a little contribution you will have our first products and you will be able to really support our startup.
Master Degree in Business Management, Marketing and Strategy at the University of Turin.
Energy and ICT engineer, consultant at Italian Parliament for policies on startups, innovation, business and energy
Information Technology engineer, shortly graduated at the Polytechnic University of Turin.
Senior Software Developer, years of experience in programming, head of software
Electronic and mechanical engineer, working on mechanical design and electronic components
Student at Art Academy of Turin, passion for fashion and art
Motor science student at University of Turin, event organizer and promoter, social addicted
Our devices are Qi Wireless charging compatible, you can also charge your phone!
Power input via USB port so that you can use the charger also with your computer.
The Wireless charger is so small that you can keep it with you everywhere.
Features that warn you when your child is leaving in order to prevent him to escape.
If your child goes beyond the limits you fixed with our application, you will receive a notification.
Our bracelet can be easily worn and it does not hurt.
Fixed to your bike or car, you can open it only thanks to a numerical combination.
Always charged device thanks to a photovoltaic panel and a battery in case of cloudy days.
